name: pocket-physics
description: Verlet physics extracted from pocket-ces demos

scripts.demos: beefy $(for f in examples/*.js; do echo "$f:examples/$(basename $f .js)-bundle.js "; done)
scripts.demos:bundle: rm examples/*-bundle.js; for js in examples/*.js; do browserify $js > examples/$(basename $js .js)-bundle.js; done

author: Drew Petersen <kirbysayshi@gmail.com>
